section.title: Software
section.para: JModelica.org is based on Java, C, and Python technology.

section.title: Java
section.para:
To build JModelica.org from sources you will need the Java SE Development Kit (JDK) version 6. (The JDK also includes the JRE.) To install JDK
Get a JDK installer suitable for your platform.
Run the installer.
